subtests.name: e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim" should set the property value
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim initial" should not set the property value
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim 2000" should not set the property value
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim scroll()" should not set the property value
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim view()" should not set the property value
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim timeline" should not set the property value
Property animation value '1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim'
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-delay

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-direction
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-duration

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-fill-mode

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-iteration-count
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-name

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-play-state

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-range-end

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-range-start
e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-timeline

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should set animation-timing-function

e.style['animation'] = "1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim1,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim2,\n   1s linear 1s 2 reverse forwards paused anim3" should not set unrelated longhands
